item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, May 1, 2025 at 8:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Dropbox will require App Indicator support on Linux (17 points | 26 comments)
2. 108B Pixel Scan of Johannes Vermeer's Girl with a Pearl Earring (189 points | 57 comments)
3. Mercury: Commercial-scale diffusion language model (305 points | 119 comments)

7. Linux Kernel Exploitation: Attack of the Vsock (189 points | 49 comments)
8. How the US defense secretary circumvents official DoD communications equipment (164 points | 107 comments)

10. Zhaoxin's KX-7000 (143 points | 35 comments)
11. Xiaomi MiMo Reasoning Model (438 points | 163 comments)

15. NotebookLM Audio Overviews are now available in over 50 languages (274 points | 83 comments)

22. Show HN: Create your own finetuned AI model using Google Sheets (112 points | 37 comments)
23. A competing theory to 'dark energy' suggests universe has different time zones (15 points | 7 comments)
24. Future of OSU Open Source Lab in Jeopardy (218 points | 74 comments)
25. You Wouldn't Download a Hacker News (401 points | 210 comments)
26. Julia Parsons, U.S. Navy Code Breaker During World War II, Dies at 104 (122 points | 9 comments)
27. The True Size Of (244 points | 110 comments)
28. Show HN: Convert Large CSV/XLSX to JSON or XML in Browser (20 points | 6 comments)
29. Show HN: ART – a new open-source RL framework for training agents (81 points | 10 comments)
30. DeepSeek-Prover-V2 (346 points | 69 comments)
